content.description: <math alttext="The figure shows a 4 column table with 3 rows of data. The heading for column 1 is “x.” The heading for column 2 is “f of x.” The heading for column 3 is “g of x.” The heading for column 4 is “f prime of x.” The data in the table are as follows. Row 1: x is 1; f of x is 2, g of x is 0; f prime of x is the fraction pi over 2. Row 2: x is 2; f of x is pi; g of x is 1; f prime of x is the fraction pi over 3. Row 3: x is pi; f of x is 4; g of x is 2; f prime of x is the fraction pi over 4." display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtable columnlines="solid" equalcolumns="true" equalrows="true" frame="solid" rowlines="solid"><mtr><mtd><mi>x</mi></mtd><mtd><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mtd><mtd><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>f</mi><mo>′</mo></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd><mi>π</mi></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mi>π</mi></mtd><mtd><mn>4</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mtd></mtr></mtable></math>
content.question: Let <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>f</mi></math> and <math alttext="g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>g</mi></math> be differentiable functions, where <math alttext="g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>g</mi></math> is the inverse of <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>f</mi></math>. Selected values of <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>f</mi></math>, <math alttext="g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>g</mi></math>, and <math alttext="f prime" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msup><mi>f</mi><mo>′</mo></msup></math> are shown in the table. What is the value of <math alttext="g prime of pi" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msup><mi>g</mi><mo>′</mo></msup><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mi>π</mi></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></math> ?

unit.text: 3: Differentiation: Composite, Implicit, and Inverse Functions

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Identify mathematical information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and/or verbal representations.
